'''Passage's Plentiful Produce''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Passage's Plentiful Produce is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest south of [[Marcotte Station]], after solving three [[Water Volume Detection Crystal]] puzzles (including the one that grants [[Court of Justice's Barrier]]) and activating the Hydro [[Elemental Monument]].
